subject: Baseball
Collectors and Collections
lead_paragraph: Charlie Sobel received a rather unusual bar mitzvah gift in 1971: 14 drawings that had once decorated the set of “Kiner’s Korner,” a long-running postgame interview show hosted by Ralph Kiner.
snippet: Charlie Sobel received a rather unusual bar mitzvah gift in 1971: 14 drawings that had once decorated the set of “Kiner’s Korner,” a long-running postgame interview show hosted by Ralph Kiner.
